name: Masala Cabbage Soup
author: bavscookin
summary: I wanted to make cabbage soup, but my Indian palette loves spices, so decided to Indianize cabbage soup. Hope you enjoy it as much as I did!
ingredients: 1 teaspoon garam masala, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat
Cook and stir serrano peppers, garlic, and ginger in the hot oil until fragrant, 15 to 20 seconds
Add onion; cook and stir until softened and transparent, 10 to 15 minutes
Mix potatoes into onion mixture and cook for 2 minutes
Add cabbage and cook for 2 minutes more
Pour chicken stock over cabbage mixture; bring to a boil
Reduce heat and simmer until potatoes are softened, 10 to 15 minutes
Season soup with garam masala and salt
Pour soup into a blender no more than half full
Cover and hold lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend
Return soup to saucepan and cook until warmed, 2 to 3 minutes
